website_summaries.verdict: This two-piece toilet with an elongated bowl is situated at chair height, performs well, and sells for a decent price.
pros: A high-efficiency product designed to conserve water
Most are satisfied with flushing power
cons: Purchase does not include supply line, seat, or lid
Potential buyers should be sure to note this

customer_reviews.title: This toilet does the job, but it's nothing special.
customer_reviews.text: If you think you are getting an exceptional flushing toilet then this one is not it. It gets the job done most of the time, but sometimes an extra flush is required. If I had to buy again, I would probably get something else. This toilet is also pretty small and looks pretty insignificant in my guest bathroom. I don't know if all the new toilets are small like this, but to tell you the truth it looks a little funny because of its small size.
customer_reviews.author: E. P.

customer_reviews.title: Description needs to clarify! Hats off to the photographer!
customer_reviews.text: The seller posted picture of the toilet and it appeared to be matte black. No where in the description does it say the toilet is glossy black. Our sinks and shower tiles are matte ceramic black, so this toilet looks out of place. I am annoyed because I would like a refund, bought through Amazon PRIME and now I have to pay return shipping even though the description is rotten. I am super disappointed. The company hasn't contacted me about the item description being in accurate. And to top it off I went back to the photos
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this toilet!
customer_reviews.text: I just had my small and only bathroom gutted and remodeled with a walk-in shower which made less space for the toilet. After hours of searching I found this one with a narrow tank and a shaker style that matches my vanity door/drawers. So far it is flushing and cleaning the entire bowl much better than my older Kohler toilet did.
customer_reviews.author: Juju

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: The toilet was in many pieces when I opened the box and I can't get the company to replace it.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Shutta

customer_reviews.title: Distributor made good on broken bowl
customer_reviews.text: Ok, so I bought a toilet on line because I couldn’t fit one in my car. Anyway the toilet came in two boxes and the tank was fine but the bowl was in pieces. I contacted the distributor efaucet and all I had to do was take pictures and within a week I had a new bowl. Big box stores didn’t offer this style. I’m in love with it’s style and sleekness and with distributor for rushing a replacement bowl.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Burke

customer_reviews.title: Sitting pretty, fit for a king.
customer_reviews.text: This Kohler toilet is just great for people with physical disabilities. The extra height makes using this toilet much easier to get up and down and the elongated bowl is much more comfortable to use. A little pricey but being physically challenged and for something you use several times a day makes my life much easier and comfortable. Would recommend to anyone regardless of physical condition. Sincerely, Ron Wells
customer_reviews.author: Ronald D. Wells

customer_reviews.title: Great Toilet
customer_reviews.text: We are 5' 9" tall. Toilet is perfect height. Not too tall and not too short. We get lots of compliments on it. YES! We get compliments on our toilet :-) . I would recommend this toilet all day long! Good buy!
customer_reviews.author: Julie A Peknik

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful toilet
customer_reviews.text: Toilet looks great in our traditional bathroom. I paired it with the archer tub, which has a square intention on the front. It has a craftsman look to it. I do think the side lever is odd, but I think it would take away from the tank detail otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: W. Lewis

customer_reviews.title: It is perfect. The only unfortunate detail is that it comes ...
customer_reviews.text: It is perfect. The only unfortunate detail is that it comes without a toilet seat but because it was shown with one, I just assumed. It is not a big problem to go buy one but it was just one more thing to do.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: yhe color is simply beautiful! I love it
customer_reviews.text: omg...yhe color is simply beautiful! I love it. It makes a bold statement in the bathroom!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful toilet with nice design and strong flush. It goes perfect in my new Georgian bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Carroll

customer_reviews.title: Love the look
customer_reviews.text: Got this and the 30" pedestal sink to match redoing our extra bath. Clean, sleek lined look. Elegant and very pretty. Everything shipped on time, and arrived in great condition. Love the look.
customer_reviews.author: DJK

customer_reviews.title: The setup was easy. You need to purchase a wax ring but ...
customer_reviews.text: The setup was easy. You need to purchase a wax ring but everything else was there. It flushed great and is quiet. We like the handle ease of use, just give it a flip and your finished. I'm am looking forward to lower water bills.
customer_reviews.author: Digger

customer_reviews.title: Looks fantastic and works great
customer_reviews.text: Easy to clean, looks great and works even better. I like the design and clean lines too. It saves lots of water too.
customer_reviews.author: The Noble One

customer_reviews.title: Very nice toilet
customer_reviews.text: Kohler has made another quality product. I really love the color and the quality of this toilet. Tank is smaller than I expected, but still worked.
customer_reviews.author: valpip

customer_reviews.title: Looks great!... FOR ME TO POOP ON!
customer_reviews.text: Great looking and works well. I guess for the price it should... we wanted high quality, so thats what we got. Very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Jeffbt

customer_reviews.title: Your gonna love it
customer_reviews.text: Very nice looking toilet. Color was as expected and we just love it
customer_reviews.author: lauren terhune

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Looking!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with our Tresham toilet. It's very pretty, sleek and has a nice profile that would work well in an older home (our's is an old Victorian) or a newer home. We like that the tank is high, but not very wide.
customer_reviews.author: B. Driscoll

customer_reviews.title: Kohler commode
customer_reviews.text: After I had this commode installed I liked it so much that I ordered another one for another bathroom. Also I noticed that my water bill was lower.
customer_reviews.author: Missie

customer_reviews.title: I feel like a little kid in a chair that is too ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a comfort height toilet but it's taller than others on the market, I am 5'3" and when I sit down, my toes touch the floor! I feel like a little kid in a chair that is too big :)
customer_reviews.author: Grayson

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: If a toilet can be considered elegant, this is it! It's clean lines & elevated height make it purely modern.
customer_reviews.author: S. L. Meyers

customer_reviews.title: Like it!
customer_reviews.text: Functions well, quietly, is a comfortable height for us older folks. Very pleased with my purchase and delivery.
customer_reviews.author: William B. Waddell

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Attractive design with clean lines but flushing isn't the greatest. Would be worth price if flush was more powerful.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda Wilton

customer_reviews.title: nice toilet
customer_reviews.text: I needed black and got a cheaper toilet first. not happy so it got sent back and I got the Kohler.
customer_reviews.author: lorin gray

customer_reviews.title: Kohler Comfort Height Toilet
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product! We are doing a renovation of our master bathroom and this is perfect. It has a very nice look and doesn't sit low to the ground as most. Highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Elusive Butterfly

customer_reviews.title: We love this,
customer_reviews.text: This toilet is a great product. I recommend to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Jlester23

customer_reviews.title: Elegant looks with excellent flushing!
customer_reviews.text: Love the looks and color (mexican sand) Very comfortable higher sitting height. Fairly quiet. For only 1.28 gpf this toilet has amazing flushing capability! No more ugly plunger next to this toilet! It really works well. High price, but you will get what you pay for. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: DANIEL M

customer_reviews.title: Beware it is a two piece toilet and Kohler can only supply the bottom bowl
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Kohler Tresham toilet three months ago and only received the bottom bowl. After dozens of calls trying to get the tank delivered they now tell me the production of the tank will be in 90 business days. Beware of purchasing Kohler products because you may never get a complete order. Also Kohler "farms" out their customer service department to and outside company, KIBO, and it is terrible. Getting in touch directly with anyone at Kohler is impossible. As a builder I will never purchase another Kohler product and tell all my clients to avoid them as well.
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: Keeper
customer_reviews.text: I really like the clean lines. Sits nice and high. Easy flush too while preserving water
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Singleton

customer_reviews.title: THE SEAT IS FAR TOO HIGH OFF THE GROUND TO USE!
customer_reviews.text: I don't know where they came up with the term 'comfort height', It's FAR too high for comfort. It's nearly useless. I can sit to pee but must use our guest bath to get the other job done. Our bodies aren't meant to sit in this position to eliminate. The bowl stains if urine is left overnight which a normal situation here in California these drought days.
customer_reviews.author: Calvinator

customer_reviews.title: Product is wrong color and does not match
customer_reviews.text: I am extremely disappointed. I ordered these via AZ- Due to a delay in my project I opened my boxes and found that the top did not match the bottom color. I ordered white and the top came in as a tan color. I ordered 2 toilets and they are both wrong. There is no one for me to reach out to so I am trying to ask Kohler for help if someone helps me I will update this review but for now I would not advise anyone to buy this product.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

product_meta.title: KOHLER K-3950-0 Tresham Comfort Height Two-Piece Elongated 1.28 GPF Toilet with AquaPiston Flush Technology and Left-Hand Trip Lever, White
product_meta.description:
Color:WhiteThe elegant simplicity of Shaker-style furniture inspires the edgy, neo-traditional design of the Tresham collection. The Tresham Comfort-Height two-piece elongated toilet is accented by an elegant trim that recalls architectural molding and offers an eclectic twist on classic Americana traditions. Complements the Tresham collection as well as a variety of styles from classic to modern.

AMAZON.COM
Kohler’s K-3950 Tresham comfort height two-piece elongated 1.28 gpf toilet features a sophisticated trim that calls to mind architectural molding and offers a quirky twist on classic Americana traditions. The Tresham collection’s combination of classic lines and contemporary design encourages people to embrace their own sense of style and create a living space that reflects their personal design philosophy. With the K-3950—available in 10 colors, including almond, black black, biscuit, cashmere, dune, ice grey, Mexican sand, sandbar, thunder grey, and white—it’s simpler than ever to mix and match your bathroom fixtures to best fit your taste and needs.



K-3950 Tresham Comfort
Height Two-Piece Toilet
At a Glance:
 * Offers remarkable bulk-flushing performance and best-in-class cleanliness
   
   
 * Qualifies as a high-efficiency toilet with a 1.28 gallon-per-flush rating
   
   
 * Three pre-installed tank bolts save installation time
   
   
 * Backed by a limited one-year warranty


The Tresham K-3950 comfort height two-piece toilet is a high-efficiency model that operates with 1.28 gpf performance capabilities (view larger.)Conservation Without Compromise
The K-3950 features Kohler’s comfort-height seat, which is similar to the height of a standard chair—making it easier for people of all ages and levels of mobility to sit and stand. Qualifying as a high-efficiency toilet, the K-3950’s 1.28 gpf performance ability meets stringent flushing guidelines set by the Environmental Protection Agency’s WaterSense program and can save up to 16,500 gallons of water per year compared with old 3.5 gpf toilets. The large 3-1/4-inch canister flush valve delivers water rapidly from the tank to the bowl, creating a power-jet action that consistently fully flushes the bowl. Its class five rating translates to remarkable bulk-waste flushing performance and best-in-class bowl cleanliness.About the Tresham Suite
The elegant simplicity of Shaker-style furniture inspires the edgy, neo-traditional design of the Tresham suite. Conveniently configurable, Tresham combines a venerable aesthetic with all the advantages of modular design, complementing vintage as well as contemporary bath décor, and allowing you to shape the next generation of classic style in your own home. The American living space is endlessly self-reflexive and paradoxical. Seriously playful. Carefully disorganized. It is steeped in the traditions of classic Americana while embracing a modern eclectic sensibility. Tresham vanities, toilets, lavatories, and shower receptors bring this playful eccentricity and eclectic elegance to the American bathroom. Go live your life. With a twist.

Tresham Warranty Information
Kohler’s Tresham products are warranted to be free of defects in material and workmanship for one year from date of installation. Kohler Co. will, at its election, repair, replace or make appropriate adjustment where Kohler Co. inspection discloses any such defects occurring in normal usage within one year after installation. Kohler Co. is not responsible for removal or installation costs.

About Kohler: Diversity and Innovation
Since 1873, Kohler Co. has been improving the lives of its customers with quality products and services. One of the oldest, largest privately held companies in the United States, Kohler Co.'s products and portfolio of brands lead the way in design and innovation. Kohler Co. offers a breadth of products and services, including plumbing fixtures, furniture, tile and stone, and primary and backup power systems, as well as award-winning hospitality and world-class golf destinations.

What's in the Box
One Kohler K-3950 Tresham comfort height two-piece elongated 1.28-gpf toilet.




Kohler's Tresham suite comprises a collection of mix-and-match fixtures that allow you to build an eclectic bathroom all your own (click each to enlarge).

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
The elegant simplicity of Shaker-style furniture inspires the edgy, neo-traditional design of the Tresham Suite. The Tresham Comfort-Height two-piece elongated toilet is accented by an elegant trim that recalls architectural molding and offers an eclectic twist on classic Americana traditions. Complements the Tresham Suite as well as a variety of styles from classic to modern.

See more
feature_bullets: Elongated bowl offers added room and comfort
Comfort Height(R) feature offers chair-height seating that makes sitting down and standing up easier for most adults
Seat and supply line not included
Combination consists of the K-4899 tank and the K-4799 bowl

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars51 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
